pkgmetadata.longdescription: WMFS2 (Window Manager From Scratch) is a lightweight and highly configurable tiling window manager for X. It can be configured with a configuration file, supports Xft (Freetype) fonts and is compliant with the Extended Window Manager Hints (EWMH) specifications, Xinerama and Xrandr. WMFS can be driven with Vi based commands (ViWMFS). Optional Imlib2 support allow WMFS to draw image instead text everywhere you want with a simple sequence. WMFS2 is the development version of WMFS. Feel free to test it...
